text: The establishment of a fund to be known as "manufacturing fund, department of correction," is authorized. The comptroller is directed to place in such fund all moneys received or realized through the sale of articles manufactured by the department of correction. The comptroller is authorized to charge against such fund any voucher received from the department of correction for the purchase of materials, supplies, equipment, repairs, replacements and royalties on manufacturing industry machines to be used in its manufacturing industries. The comptroller is further directed to transfer to the general fund of the city at the end of each calendar year any sums remaining in such manufacturing fund in excess of seventy-five thousand dollars of the unencumbered balance.
